tasks.title: Research: Refactor large files exceeding maintainability thresholds
tasks.description:
Research and analysis required for implementing: "Refactor large files exceeding maintainability thresholds"

**Implementation Task Details:**
Refactor 9 large TypeScript files that exceed 1600+ lines for better maintainability: ai-governance-engine.ts (2025 lines), blueprint-collaboration.ts (1953 lines), connections.ts (1916 lines), notifications.ts (1849 lines), billing.ts (1803 lines), policy-compliance-validation.ts (1761 lines), compliance-policy.ts (1703 lines), folders.ts (1687 lines), zero-trust-auth.ts (1633 lines). Break into smaller, focused modules with clear responsibilities.

**Research Objectives:**
1. Investigate best practices and methodologies for this implementation
2. Identify potential challenges, risks, and mitigation strategies  
3. Research relevant technologies, frameworks, and tools
4. Define implementation approach and architecture decisions
5. Provide actionable recommendations and guidance

**Implementation Task ID:** task_1755851844250_1emaw8wdt

**Auto-created by:** TaskManager research dependency system
**Research Priority:** This research task must be completed before implementation begins
success_criteria: Implementation guidance and best practices identified
Risk assessment and mitigation strategies outlined

tasks.title: Update outdated npm dependencies to latest versions
tasks.description: Update 15 outdated packages including major updates: @eslint/js (9.32.0→9.33.0), @typescript-eslint/* (6.21.0→8.40.0), eslint (8.57.1→9.33.0), fastmcp (3.10.0→3.15.0), jest (29.7.0→30.0.5), redis (4.7.1→5.8.2), typescript (5.8.3→5.9.2), zod (3.25.76→4.0.17), and others. Need to check for breaking changes and update configurations accordingly.

tasks.title: Fix failing end-to-end tests in tool registration
tasks.description: Fix test failures in tests/e2e/tool-registration-execution.test.ts. Multiple tests failing with expectation errors - received 0 but expected >= 5 in test execution summary and validation. Also fix ts-jest deprecation warning about globals config.
